description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. www.yyrgames.com - Peppy the Penguin's igloo is under siege in this action-packed puzzle game! Help Peppy dodge the falling blocks. Then, eliminate like-colored blocks by kicking or throwing them into each other. Watch out for Wally the Walrus, and crush him before he causes trouble! Enjoy authentic retro sound effects and worldwide score competition with Internet Ranking!
